text: [Music] welcome to fers Welcome to My Channel today we are harvesting orra follow along and see the way we did it as you we observe we will realize that the okra is planted amidst other crops it is a mix cropping that we have as you can observe it here see the okra you see some um a very young uh corn likewise you see Caba in form of a mixed cropping so it's not only okra that is there as you can see yes so it's mixed cropping see the bigger okra here and then some uh Little Corn they also there so it is mixed croing so right now we want to do some harvesting of the okra for follow along and watch to the end and see what we can also achieve apart from eating the okra fruits so coming as you can see we were using knife to cut the orra fruits not just cutting them by mere hands what is see to the end check ERS check ERS see any other one right now there are no more okay let's check other plants no more okay we have here all right now if you don't Harvest them on time they become too hard and not suitable for eating any longer they must be fresh and soft for them to be suitable for eating otherwise you leave them like that to mature and dried up you may leave them to mature and dry up such as this ones it become too hard like this one now you may leave them on the plant and let it dry up for preservation of seeds for planting in another planting season okay when it dries up and the seeds be ready for planting in another planting season but for consumption they have to be soft and not hard so for you to be usedful cooking okay [Music] okay
